response.overview: Firefighters, Architects and Engineers are exposing the 9/11 facts about the evidence for the controlled demolition of the Twin Towers and Building 7 falling at 5:20pm on 9/11. Witness 12 World Trade Center Myths exposed by experts: • “Only 2 towers destroyed on 9/11” • “Thorough investigation” • “Tested for explosives” • “No explosives found” • “No witnesses of explosions” • “Hot fires”  • “No molten steel/iron” • “Fires created free-fall collapse of WTC Building 7”. Examine the explosive forensic evidence. Watch the testimony from first responders, news reporters & witnesses. Discover the crucial omissions from government reports. Engage in this dynamic rapid-paced and power-packed live multi-media presentation about the most important event of our time.
response.tagline: More than 200 firefighters and 2,300 architects and engineers are calling for a new investigation of 9/11.
response.title: Firefighters Architects & Engineers – Expose 9/11 Myths

results.name: Firefighters, Architects & Engineers Expose 9/11 Myths Official Trailer September 11, 2015 Premiere
